name: Teriyaki Chicken
ingredients: 1/2 C white sugar 1/4 C apple cider vinegar
steps: Place 12 skinless chicken thighs in baking pan
In a sauce pan mix on low-­‐med:
Once sauce is at a boil add :
Mix 1 Tbsp. corn starch and 1 Tbsp. water and slowly add into sauce to thicken, lightly boil until it thickens
Brush sauce on chicken (you will repeat this 2-­‐3 times while baking). Cover and cook at 350 for 30 minutes
and the brush on sauce, cooked 10 minutes more then brush on more and then 10 more minutes and brush
again then let cook for 10 more minutes. Serve over Rice. Very Yummy!!!
